amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 54 in the Congressional Record of September 23, 1997, to prohibit funding from being used for the State Department to make or carry out any contract authorizing any private entity to assess a charge or fee upon U.S. citizens for information about U.S. passports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
